Gutter Options

vue3-ssr-carousel
  • Introduction
  • Events
  • Responsive
  • Gutters
  • UI
  • Looping
  • Peeking
  • Accessibility
  • Miscellaneous

Numbers values are treated as pixels

Slide 1
Slide 2
Slide 3
Item 1 of 2
<ssr-carousel :slides-per-page="2" :gutter="40">
  <slide :index="1"></slide>
  <slide :index="2"></slide>
  <slide :index="3"></slide>
</ssr-carousel>

Any CSS value is valid

Slide 1
Slide 2
Slide 3
Item 1 of 2
<ssr-carousel :slides-per-page="2" gutter="3%">
  <slide :index="1"></slide>
  <slide :index="2"></slide>
  <slide :index="3"></slide>
</ssr-carousel>

You can even use CSS custom properties

Slide 1
Slide 2
Slide 3
Item 1 of 2
<template>
  <ssr-carousel :slides-per-page="2" gutter="var(--fluid-gutter)">
    <slide :index="1"></slide>
    <slide :index="2"></slide>
    <slide :index="3"></slide>
  </ssr-carousel>
</template>
<style lang="scss">
body {
  --fluid-gutter: 40px, 20px;
}
</style>

Gutters are responsive

Slide 1
Slide 2
Slide 3
Slide 4
Slide 5
Item 1 of 2
<ssr-carousel
  :slides-per-page="3"
  :gutter="40"
  :responsive="[
    {
      maxWidth: 1024,
      slidesPerPage: 2,
      gutter: 20
    }
  ]"
>
  <slide :index="1"></slide>
  <slide :index="2"></slide>
  <slide :index="3"></slide>
  <slide :index="4"></slide>
  <slide :index="5"></slide>
</ssr-carousel>
